A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Love Star Wars. Parts of The Last Jedi are Epic Star Wars. A scene calls up back to Return of the Jedi. New force abilities are explored. New characters do things that are astonishing. One scene is directly out of my dreams as a child. All that being said\, movie suffers in pacing\, story\, and how it handles lore. Humor at times just doesn't work. Overall a good time at the movies\, but should have been about 30 min shorter.
